name: apix/cache
description: A thin PSR-6 cache wrapper with a generic interface to various caching backends emphasising cache taggging and indexing to Redis, Memcached, PDO/SQL, APC and other adapters.

suggest.ext-apc: Allows to cache into APC data store ~ up to PHP 5.4.
suggest.ext-apcu: Allows to use APCu userland caching ~ any PHP version.
suggest.ext-redis: So you can cache into Redis servers.
suggest.ext-mongo: Allows to cache into MongoDB instances using http://php.net/mongo  ~ up to PHP 5.6.
suggest.ext-mongodb: Allows to cache into MongoDB instances using https://php.net/mongodb ~ from PHP 7 and above and HHVM.
suggest.ext-memcached: Allows to use Memcached distributed memory caching system
suggest.ext-pdo: Allows to cache into PDO supported DBs such as Oracle, MS SQL server, IBM DB2.
